channel.title: ClassNotFoundException on every single Java applet
channel.description:
I am having problems running all web based java applets. I get the common ClassNotFoundException. I have tried lower updates of java, including java 6, i have installed, reinstalled aswell. Tried 64 bit and 32 bit, i just cant figure it out. I even tried messing with the environmental variables and that did not work either. Can anyone help me? I am stumped and I need it to work for school.
Was working fine before I installed Windows 8, now it does this. It has to be some kind of setting.

item.title: ClassNotFoundException on every single Java applet
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Refered to it before, thanks though.

Read full topic
